post_text: September 13, 2018 at 6:08â€¯AM#1Hi there does any one know the CMD line for automating the adding of a CMD line into a specific cue?EG Add (Assign SOLO Executor 106) to 106.4 ????This way in a stack when i go to a curtain cue in my stack it will change my flash key to Solo then i can have one in the next cue changing it back to Flash....Thanks
title: Adding CMD line into cue by command line
